title: Fantasy Camp lesson learned ...
subtitle: Fantasy Camp Day 4: Bring your own ice
body: The Diamondbacks this week are holding their first Fantasy Camp down at their Spring Training complex in Tucson, Ariz. Steve Gilbert, who covers the Diamondbacks for MLB.com, is taking part in the camp and will be writing a daily diary of his experiences.  TUCSON, Ariz. -- There are some lessons you learn in life that don't really cost you much -- maybe a couple of dollars or a few anxious moments. And then there are the lessons that cause physical pain.  We're going to talk about the latter today. Steve Gilbert is a reporter for MLB.com. This story was not subject to the approval of Major League Baseball or its clubs.
author: Steve Gilbert
